## BlogJsonLdProps.headline property

The headline of the article.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
headline: string | string[];
```

## Remarks

Headlines should not exceed 110 characters. For AMP stories, the headline should match the text in the first cover page in the AMP Story.
